attributes.action: Hold a referendum on drones in UK skies
attributes.additional_details:
Drones look set to fill the skies of the UK in the coming decades as a result of multinational companies such as Amazon seeing a business opportunity. UK citizens should be asked if they want the UK's environment to change in such a fundamental way, so that the sound of birdsong is in many areas set to be replaced by the humming of drones.

Let's have a referendum to decide if UK citizens want their skies to fill with drones.
